long_desc.thetext:
An attacker can craft a malformed TIFF image which will consume a significant amount of memory when passed to DecodeConfig. This could lead to a denial of service.

https://go.dev/cl/468195
https://go.dev/issue/58003
https://groups.google.com/g/golang-announce/c/ag-FiyjlD5o
https://pkg.go.dev/vuln/GO-2023-1572

Created golang-x-image tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2178355]

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2178354]

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2022-41727

bugs.title: CVE-2022-41727 golang-x-image: golang.org/x/image: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2022-41727 golang-x-image: golang.org/x/image: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption [fedora-all]

long_desc.thetext:
An attacker can craft a malformed TIFF image which will consume a significant amount of memory when passed to DecodeConfig. This could lead to a denial of service.

https://go.dev/cl/468195
https://go.dev/issue/58003
https://groups.google.com/g/golang-announce/c/ag-FiyjlD5o
https://pkg.go.dev/vuln/GO-2023-1572

Created golang-x-image tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2178355]


Created hugo tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2178354]

This bug is now closed. Further updates for individual products will be reflected on the CVE page(s):

https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/cve-2022-41727

More information about this security flaw is available in the following bug:

http://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2174311

Disclaimer: Community trackers are created by Red Hat Product Security team on a best effort basis. Package maintainers are required to ascertain if the flaw indeed affects their package, before starting the update process.

Use the following template to for the 'fedpkg update' request to submit an
update for this issue as it contains the top-level parent bug(s) as well as
this tracking bug.  This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated
when new packages are pushed to stable.

# Bug numbers: 1234,9876

# Description of your update

stable_karma=3
unstable_karma=-3

bugs.title: CVE-2023-29407 golang.org/x/image/tiff: excessive CPU consumption in decoding

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2023-29407 golang.org/x/image/tiff: excessive CPU consumption in decoding

long_desc.thetext:
A maliciously-crafted image can cause excessive CPU consumption in decoding. A tiled image with a height of 0 and a very large width can cause excessive CPU consumption, despite the image size (width * height) appearing to be zero.

https://go.dev/cl/514897
https://go.dev/issue/61581
https://pkg.go.dev/vuln/GO-2023-1990

Created golang-x-image tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2229614]


Created hugo tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2229613]

bugs.title: CVE-2023-29408 golang.org/x/image/tiff: TIFF decoder does not place a limit on the size of compressed tile data

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2023-29408 golang.org/x/image/tiff: TIFF decoder does not place a limit on the size of compressed tile data

long_desc.thetext:
The TIFF decoder does not place a limit on the size of compressed tile data. A maliciously-crafted image can exploit this to cause a small image (both in terms of pixel width/height, and encoded size) to make the decoder decode large amounts of compressed data, consuming excessive memory and CPU.

https://pkg.go.dev/vuln/GO-2023-1989
https://go.dev/cl/514897
https://go.dev/issue/61582

Created golang-x-image tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2229617]


Created hugo tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 2229618]

https://go.dev/issue/61581
https://pkg.go.dev/vuln/GO-2023-1990
